Module RobotGUI

Package application

package application
  • Class
    Description
    AdvancedRobot
    Represents an advanced robot that inherits from BasicRobot.
    ArenaSizeAdjuster
    A class responsible for adjusting the size of the robot arena.
    BasicRobot
    Represents a Basic Robot that moves within the arena, has sensors to detect obstacles, and can adjust its behavior based on sensor inputs.
    KillerRobot
    Represents a Killer Robot that can kill other robots by colliding with them.
    Line
     
    MazeObstacle
    Represents a maze obstacle within the robot arena.
    MyCanvas
     
    Obstacle
    Represents an obstacle within the robot arena.
    Robot
    Abstract class representing a Robot.
    RobotArena
    Class representing the arena where robots are placed and interact.
    RobotInterface
    The main GUI application for simulating robots in an arena.
    Save
    Class responsible for saving and loading the arena, robots, and obstacles to/from a file.
    TeleportingRobot
    A subclass of BasicRobot that introduces teleportation behavior.
    TextFile
    A class for reading from and writing to text files User can define the extension for such files Now exist methods to read/write whole file as single string lines separated by \n
    UserControlledRobot
    A subclass of BasicRobot that is controlled by user input.
    UserControlledRobot.Direction
    Enum representing the possible movement directions for the robot.
